verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> was the <S%H7224>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%>

The <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

From <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H2088>that<s%> is the <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1961>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, rising <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H1696>speaking;<s%> but ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> rising <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> them; but ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

They <S%H559>said,<s%> Turn ye <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4480>way,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> and from the <S%H4480>evil<s%> <S%H7455><s%> of your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> unto you and to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5704>ever:<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, and to <S%H7812>worship<s%> them, and provoke me not to <S%H3808>anger<s%> <S%H3707><s%> <S%H853><s%> with the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands;<s%> and I will do you no <S%H3808>hurt.<s%> <S%H7489><s%>

Yet ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye might provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%> to your own <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1697>words,<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof, and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and will utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> them, and <S%H7760>make<s%> them an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and a <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> and <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2723>desolations.<s%>

Moreover I will <S%H6>take<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>mirth,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride,<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7347>millstones,<s%> and the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H5216>candle.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H2723>desolation,<s%> and an <S%H8047>astonishment;<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> are <S%H4390>accomplished,<s%> that I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H854>for<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and will <S%H7760>make<s%> it <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8077>desolations.<s%>

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> hath <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H1992>themselves<s%> of them <S%H1571>also:<s%> and I will <S%H7999>recompense<s%> them according to their <S%H6467>deeds,<s%> and according to the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their own <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me; <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2534>fury<s%> at my <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H853>cause<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> thee, to <S%H8248>drink<s%> it.

And they shall <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and be <S%H1607>moved,<s%> and be <S%H1984>mad,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> them.

Then <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853>I<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> at the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H853>made<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H8248>drink,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> me:

To <S%H853>wit,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> thereof, <S%H853>and<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> thereof, to <S%H5414>make<s%> them a <S%H2723>desolation,<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> a <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse;<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%>
<S%H853><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people;<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the mingled <S%H6154>people,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> and <S%H5804>Azzah,<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%>
<S%H853><s%> <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6721>Zidon,<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H339>isles<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%>
Dedan, <S%H1719><s%> and <S%H8485>Tema,<s%> and <S%H938>Buz,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that are in the <S%H7112>utmost<s%> <S%H6285>corners,<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6152>Arabia,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the mingled <S%H6154>people<s%> that <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4057>desert,<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes,<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> and <S%H7138>near,<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>world,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8347>Sheshach<s%> shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them.

Therefore thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H8354>Drink<s%> ye, and be <S%H7937>drunken,<s%> and <S%H7006>spew,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more, <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> you.

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> they <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> at thine <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> then shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> Ye shall certainly <S%H8354>drink.<s%> <S%H8354><s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H2490>begin<s%> to bring <S%H7489>evil<s%> on the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and should <S%H859>ye<s%> be utterly <S%H5352>unpunished?<s%> <S%H5352><s%> Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5352>unpunished:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will call <S%H7121>for<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7580>roar<s%> from on <S%H4480>high,<s%> <S%H4791><s%> and <S%H5414>utter<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4480>habitation;<s%> <S%H4583><s%> he shall mightily <S%H7580>roar<s%> <S%H7580><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H5116>habitation;<s%> he shall <S%H6030>give<s%> a <S%H1959>shout,<s%> as they that <S%H1869>tread<s%> the grapes, <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

A <S%H7588>noise<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> will <S%H8199>plead<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> he will <S%H5414>give<s%> them that are <S%H7563>wicked<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H4480>nation<s%> <S%H1471><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%> shall be raised <S%H5782>up<s%> from the <S%H4480>coasts<s%> <S%H3411><s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> from one <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the other <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5594>lamented,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H622>gathered,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6912>buried;<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1828>dung<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

Howl, <S%H3213><s%> ye <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and <S%H2199>cry;<s%> and wallow <S%H6428>yourselves<s%> in the ashes, ye <S%H117>principal<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2873>slaughter<s%> and of your <S%H8600>dispersions<s%> are <S%H4390>accomplished;<s%> and ye shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> like a <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>
And the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> shall have no way to <S%H4480>flee,<s%> <S%H6><s%> <S%H4498><s%> nor the <S%H4480>principal<s%> <S%H117><s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> to <S%H6413>escape.<s%>

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and a <S%H3215>howling<s%> of the <S%H117>principal<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> shall be heard: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7703>spoiled<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4830>pasture.<s%>
And the <S%H7965>peaceable<s%> <S%H4999>habitations<s%> are cut <S%H1826>down<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

He hath <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> his <S%H5520>covert,<s%> as the <S%H3715>lion:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H8047>desolate<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of the <S%H3238>oppressor,<s%> and <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>
